channel.title: Autocasting!

item.title: Autocasting!
item.dc:creator: @Macko11 Macko11
item.description:
@Macko11 wrote:

HEY, CAN SOMEONE TELL ME HOW TO PROPERLY HOW TO ADD AUTOCAST BECAUSE BEFORE I HAD THIS UNDER PLAYER IMPLEMENTS RUNNABLE

public int autoCastTime = 0; public void autoCastTime(int Time) { autoCastTime = Time; } public void autoCastBarrage() { if (autoCastTime == 0) { hitDiff = misc.random(30); stillgfx(369, absY, absX); setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; autoCastTime = 70; PkingDelay = 10; deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell!"); } }
ALSO I HAD THE OTHER STUFF LIKE SO IF THE ANCIENTS STAFF IS EQUIPPED IT WILL WORKK BUT IT DOESNT SO CAN SOMEONE HELP ME PLEASE?

Read full topic
